items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Every women should own and black dress, and this is the one!
items.body: I'm going to start off by saying that I am so obsessed with this dress I ordered a second one a few months after because I wore it so much. Fancy dinners, weddings, funerals, this is the dress I wore. It goes with any occasion. The fabric, I don't even know where to start. It is so lightweight, but not see through. It hugs the curves and stretches without giving the look of being stretched. It is a simple, elegant dress that exceeded my expectations. Read more
items.author: Bre

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit for Curvy girl!
items.body: I'm curvy girl and for me the dress Looks amazing, Fits amazing, Can't see through the material and is now my fave go to for casual outing or date night!! Read more
items.author: Courtney

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars so soft and chic.
items.body: I loved this dress for the style and the fabric. If you are on the taller side the dress will not be as long. But it also allows it to be worn with sneakers and more casual type shoes for a night out on vacation or casual event. Then you can wear it with some killer heels and go red carpet. The size small for me felt a bit large compared to how most of these 'body con" styles tend to fit. That was great for comfort, but if you like a more extreme body hugging look, you can try going down a size unless you are very curvy. If you are a size XS or a 0-2 you can still wear the size Small which is what I did. It will still look so chic, and it will still flatter and give a feminine shape and still be a bit more forgiving in the thigh and stomach areas. the Fabric is on the thin side and while it's incredibly soft you may want to wear something that doesn't show panty lines, better yet a good seamless slip short. I would have given it 5 stars if it was cut just a tiny bit closer to the body. The dress is very stretchy so a bit less material would have allowed it to accommodate more body types. Read more
items.author: aka Grey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress material is thin
items.body: The dress is very nice. Love the color. The fabric is a little thin but itâ€™s very comfortable and you can dress it up or down. Read more
items.author: Wendy Radicy

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Donâ€™t do it
items.body: This dress is horrible, the material is not see through which is the only positive thing I have to say. There is no shape to this dress, it gives morticia vibes and the smell is horrible. Do not waste your money, find something else because this is not it and I will be returning. Read more
items.author: S. White

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not perfect but good
items.body: Nice, make it perfect by higher slit on side, POCKETS & more neck room. But nice feel, sizing good, length good. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars To long and big
items.body: This dress runs very long and big I would go one size down Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Ruched Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Ruched Cocktail Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Wine, Brown, Hazeblue, Rust, Apricot, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
